entry.title: Current Conditions: 4.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Victoria Gonzales 09:00 AM PST Friday 03 March 2023
Temperature: 4.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.4 kPa falling
Humidity: 74 %
Dewpoint: 0.4°C
Wind: WSW 27 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 1

entry.title: Friday: Chance of showers. High 6. POP 70%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers changing to 70 percent chance of showers near noon. Wind light except west 50 km/h near Juan de Fuca Strait this morning. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h this morning. High 6. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few showers. Low plus 2.
entry.summary: Showers. Wind becoming southeast 30 km/h late this evening. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of showers. High 7. POP 70%
